org.mt4j.input.inputData
Class ActiveCursorPool

java.lang.Object
  org.mt4j.input.inputData.ActiveCursorPool

public class ActiveCursorPool
extends java.lang.Object

This class is basically a centralized wrapper for a HashMap acting as a store for active inputs. cursors are added when a new Touch is registered. cursors should be put in the map by using their cursor-ID. When the cursor has ended they have to be removed again.

Author:
Christopher Ruff
